title: Command request
description: Request the core CLI to perform a command. This is required for sudo and interactive

command.description: The command that is requesting sudo

options.description: The options for codifySpawn that is needed to run the command

cwd.description: Current working directory to run codifySpawn in

requiresRoot.description: Whether or not this command needs to be run in root

interactive.description: Whether or not this command needs to be run in interactive mode

stdin.description: Whether or not this command requires stdin
